spec_data.Name: perl-Pod-Coverage
spec_data.Description:
Developers hate writing documentation.  They'd hate it even more if their
computer tattled on them, but maybe they'll be even more thankful in the
long run.  Even if not, perlmodstyle tells you to, so you must obey.

This module provides a mechanism for determining if the pod for a given
module is comprehensive.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:13:49 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Checks if the documentation of a module is comprehensive
